Text: I'm working on putting the 2nd leg of the Boston '91 run this week.

Much thanks my friend.Irember these shows.It took Hornsby a couple of shows to get going,but by the time they hit NYC the band was on fire.If I'am not mistaken I saw 2of the 3 in Philly and Hornsby wasn't there yet.Vinnie was flippin' through a note book.Thanks agian Lex
